name: Monster truck Offroad Shooting - Free Racing Game
name_original: Monster truck Offroad Shooting - Free Racing Game
description:
Have you ever thought about what it would be like if you were a monster truck driver? Well now you can see!

Monster truck Offroad Shooting - Free Racing Game
is a fun racing game for everyone!

Get ready to drive through over exciting levels in this shooting and physics based Monster Truck action game - Monster truck Offroad Shooting - Free Racing Game.
